items.title: New cell phone steps: Microsoft Authenticator reset
steps: Tell them you need your Microsoft Authenticator app reset.
Wait for them to complete the reset — they will walk you through it.
Do not attempt to reset, reinstall, or reconfigure Authenticator on your own.
Once reset, follow Inacomp’s instructions to set up the app on the new phone.
items.note: ⚠️ This is the only supported method. Other attempts can cause account lockouts.

items.title: Send out fax: Nextiva vFAX portal
steps: Log in to the vFAX Portal and enter your credentials.
Click **Send A Fax** from the dashboard.
Fill out: **Fax Number** (required), **Deliver To**, **Sent From**, **Fax Subject**, and **Notes**.
Optionally include a cover page or schedule a send time.
If using your own cover page, remove the default cover page and attach yours first.
Click **Next** and upload up to 10 files; files send in the order added.
Click **Next** to preview; the preview may show template placeholders — this is normal.
Choose fax **Type** and **Folder**, optionally add a memo, and add up to five additional recipients.
Notes: A fax cannot be canceled once sent; typical send speed is 1–3 minutes per page.

items.title: Setup email signature
items.note: Only change your **Name** and **Title**. Do not add other links or information. Call Ankur if you have questions: 770-608-8199.
